00006   /* the conversion matrix can be readed the following way */
00007   /* if you go down, the factor is for the numerator (multiply) */
00008   /* if you go right, the factor is for the denominator (divide) */
00009   /* and yes, we actually use both, not sure why, but why not!? */
00010 
00011   const double size_conversion_factors[6][6] =
00012   {
00013              /*  in         cm         pc         mm         pt         px        */
00014     /* in   */ { 1,         2.54,      6,         25.4,      72,        96,       },
00015     /* cm   */ { 1.0/2.54,  1,         6.0/2.54,  10,        72.0/2.54, 96.0/2.54 },
00016     /* pc   */ { 1.0/6.0,   2.54/6.0,  1,         25.4/6.0,  72.0/6.0,  96.0/6.0  },
00017     /* mm   */ { 1.0/25.4,  1.0/10.0,  6.0/25.4,  1,         72.0/25.4, 96.0/25.4 },
00018     /* pt   */ { 1.0/72.0,  2.54/72.0, 6.0/72.0,  25.4/72.0, 1,         96.0/72.0 },
00019     /* px   */ { 1.0/96.0,  2.54/96.0, 6.0/96.0,  25.4/96.0, 72.0/96.0, 1,        }
00020   };
00021 
00022   const double angle_conversion_factors[4][4] =
00023   {
00024              /*  deg        grad       rad        turn      */
00025     /* deg  */ { 1,         40.0/36.0, PI/180.0,  1.0/360.0 },
00026     /* grad */ { 36.0/40.0, 1,         PI/200.0,  1.0/400.0 },
00027     /* rad  */ { 180.0/PI,  200.0/PI,  1,         0.5/PI    },
00028     /* turn */ { 360.0,     400.0,     2.0*PI,    1         }
00029   };
00030 
00031   const double time_conversion_factors[2][2] =
00032   {
00033              /*  s          ms        */
00034     /* s    */ { 1,         1000.0    },
00035     /* ms   */ { 1/1000.0,  1         }
00036   };
00037   const double frequency_conversion_factors[2][2] =
00038   {
00039              /*  Hz         kHz       */
00040     /* Hz   */ { 1,         1/1000.0  },
00041     /* kHz  */ { 1000.0,    1         }
00042   };
00043   const double resolution_conversion_factors[3][3] =
00044   {
00045              /*  dpi        dpcm       dppx     */
00046     /* dpi  */ { 1,         2.54,      96       },
00047     /* dpcm */ { 1/2.54,    1,         96/2.54  },
00048     /* dppx */ { 1/96.0,    2.54/96,   1        }
00049   };
00050 
00051   SassUnitType get_unit_type(SassUnit unit)
00052   {
00053     switch (unit & 0xFF00)
00054     {
00055       case SIZE: return SIZE; break;
00056       case ANGLE: return ANGLE; break;
00057       case TIME: return TIME; break;
00058       case FREQUENCY: return FREQUENCY; break;
00059       case RESOLUTION: return RESOLUTION; break;
00060       default: return INCOMMENSURABLE; break;
00061     }
00062   };
00063 
00064   SassUnit string_to_unit(const string& s)
00065   {
00066     // size units
00067     if      (s == "px") return PX;
00068     else if (s == "pt") return PT;
00069     else if (s == "pc") return PC;
00070     else if (s == "mm") return MM;
00071     else if (s == "cm") return CM;
00072     else if (s == "in") return IN;
00073     // angle units
00074     else if (s == "deg") return DEG;
00075     else if (s == "grad") return GRAD;
00076     else if (s == "rad") return RAD;
00077     else if (s == "turn") return TURN;
00078     // time units
00079     else if (s == "s") return SEC;
00080     else if (s == "ms") return MSEC;
00081     // frequency units
00082     else if (s == "Hz") return HERTZ;
00083     else if (s == "kHz") return KHERTZ;
00084     // resolutions units
00085     else if (s == "dpi") return DPI;
00086     else if (s == "dpcm") return DPCM;
00087     else if (s == "dppx") return DPPX;
00088     // for unknown units
00089     else return UNKNOWN;
00090   }
00091 
00092   const char* unit_to_string(SassUnit unit)
00093   {
00094     switch (unit) {
00095       // size units
00096       case PX: return "px"; break;
00097       case PT: return "pt"; break;
00098       case PC: return "pc"; break;
00099       case MM: return "mm"; break;
00100       case CM: return "cm"; break;
00101       case IN: return "in"; break;
00102       // angle units
00103       case DEG: return "deg"; break;
00104       case GRAD: return "grad"; break;
00105       case RAD: return "rad"; break;
00106       case TURN: return "turn"; break;
00107       // time units
00108       case SEC: return "s"; break;
00109       case MSEC: return "ms"; break;
00110       // frequency units
00111       case HERTZ: return "Hz"; break;
00112       case KHERTZ: return "kHz"; break;
00113       // resolutions units
00114       case DPI: return "dpi"; break;
00115       case DPCM: return "dpcm"; break;
00116       case DPPX: return "dppx"; break;
00117       // for unknown units
00118       default: return ""; break;;
00119     }
00120   }
00121 
00122   // throws incompatibleUnits exceptions
00123   double conversion_factor(const string& s1, const string& s2)
00124   {
00125     // assert for same units
00126     if (s1 == s2) return 1;
00127     // get unit enum from string
00128     SassUnit u1 = string_to_unit(s1);
00129     SassUnit u2 = string_to_unit(s2);
00130     // query unit group types
00131     SassUnitType t1 = get_unit_type(u1);
00132     SassUnitType t2 = get_unit_type(u2);
00133     // get absolute offset
00134     // used for array acces
00135     size_t i1 = u1 - t1;
00136     size_t i2 = u2 - t2;
00137     // error if units are not of the same group
00138     if (t1 != t2) throw incompatibleUnits(u1, u2);
00139     // only process known units
00140     if (u1 != UNKNOWN && u2 != UNKNOWN) {
00141       switch (t1) {
00142         case SIZE: return size_conversion_factors[i1][i2]; break;
00143         case ANGLE: return angle_conversion_factors[i1][i2]; break;
00144         case TIME: return time_conversion_factors[i1][i2]; break;
00145         case FREQUENCY: return frequency_conversion_factors[i1][i2]; break;
00146         case RESOLUTION: return resolution_conversion_factors[i1][i2]; break;
00147         // ToDo: should we throw error here?
00148         case INCOMMENSURABLE: return 0; break;
00149       }
00150     }
00151     // fallback
00152     return 1;
00153   }
00154 
00155 }
